course_description: We will take a deep dive into the employment, business, and investment immigration statutes, regulations, and case law. We will discuss the whats and the whys of these laws, how they are used and misused, and how to process and obtain them. We will also analyze how politics affects these laws, regulations, and policies and how irregular immigration impacts this aspect of regular immigration.
